title: 2Bd/2Ba *House* - No Fee - w/d in unit - Avail 9/1 - Dog ok
posting_body: ['Your own private, single family house in East Boston!', 'Text 617-872-5083 to set up showing.', '- 1250 Square feet', '- Spacious bedrooms with plenty of closet space, and basement storage', '- Private front patio with charming blue fir, perfect for grilling and summer entertaining', '- Washer / dryer', '- Wall / Window AC', '- Modern finishings and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, and built-in microwave', '- Large eat-in kitchen with granite countertops and solid wood cabinets', '- Hardwood floors throughout', '- Large bathroom upstairs renovated this year, with second full bathroom on first floor', '- Wood Island Blue Line T stop: 17 minutes door to door to Downtown', '- Bright and open feel with great light and lots of sun', '- Lots of shops, restaurants, and bars in the neighborhood', '* Good credit and references required.', '*', 'First, Last, Security and required before move in', '* Small dogs ok (accepted on a case by case basis)', '* Non-smoking only']
